text: hello everyone my name is John and I'm
24 years old I graduated from her
university majored in English the
language currently I am a teacher at LAN
master and I've been teaching here for
more than one year I
really really love traveling I always
want to explore Vietnam other countries
and the world I also try to visit a new
place once a month another hobby of mind
is really I've been reading since I was
even a kid since I was six yeah you can
call me a nerd because I've been reading
a lot a lot of books and one of my
favorite book is never eat alone in the
beginning I told you that I'm a teacher
at langmaster right but to be honest I'm
not just a teacher in my class I have to
become an entertainer an actress a
dancer even a clown because I know it
will have my students tune get more to
have them enjoy English and I know when
they love English but they have passion
for English they will speak English more
confidently and more effectively I
also plan to work full of master for a
lot of times because Landmaster has been
giving me a lot a lot of valuable things
one teaching here means I can have a lot
of love students to improve not just
their English but also their lives
because I know with English the most
powerful tool in Vietnam you can get a
better grades better school better
University but the jobs more money right
second of all the bond I have with my
students is very special and unique it's
not the bond you have with a teacher
student the bond is similar like the
bond you have with your family
anyways family you just love your family
right side of all lap Buster has made
the person who I am today teaching is
not just positive things it's not just

through those hard times I grow more as

really appreciate everything you like
mustard is done for me thank you for
